inBranch.error403: Error 403: {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}} was moved permanently (from {{- repo.branch}}).
inBranch.error404: Error 404: The branch {{- repo.branch}} was not found in {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}.

inRepo.error301: Error 301: {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}  was moved permanently.
inRepo.error403: Error 403: this action is forbidden for {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}.
inRepo.error404: Error 404: {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}: is not found.

rateLimit.command: Check the rate limit of the GitHub API
rateLimit.limited: You have reached the rate limit of the GitHub API. The limit will be reset at {{- resetTime}}.
rateLimit.notLimited: You are not rate limited. You can make {{- remaining}} requests before the limit is reset at {{- resetTime}}.

checkValidity.repoExistsTestBranch: Repository {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}} exists. Now testing the {{- repo.branch}} branch.
checkValidity.success: {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}} seems to be valid!
checkValidity.title: Test the connection to the configured repository

copyLink.title: Create a link to this note

runOtherRepo.noFile: No file is active or the file is not shared
runOtherRepo.title: Run command for a repository

commands.uploadAllNewEditedNote: Refresh published and upload new notes

deletion.defaultFolder: You need a default folder name in the settings to use this command.
deletion.rootFolder: You need to configure a root folder in the settings to use this command.

error.autoClean: Since {{- what}} is empty, auto-cleaning is disabled.
error.dataview: Unable to render dataview query. Please update the dataview plugin to the last version.
error.errorConfig: Error configuring {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}. Please check your settings.
error.errorPublish: Error during upload to {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}
error.mergeconflic: Pull-request is not mergeable, you need to do it manually.
error.normal: The 404 error is normal ! It means that the file does not exist yet. Don't worry ❤️.
error.unablePublishMultiNotes: Unable to upload multiple notes, something went wrong.
error.unablePublishNote: Unable to upload note {{- file}}, skipping it

informations.foundNoteToSend: Found {{- nbNotes}} new notes to send

migrating.fileReplace: Migration of filename replace to the new format...
migrating.oldSettings: Migration of old settings to new settings format...
migrating.subFolder: Adding replacing subfolder to the folderpath replacement...

informations.scanningRepo: Scanning the repository, may take a while...
informations.sendMessage: Upload {{- nbNotes}} notes to {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}
informations.successPublishOneNote: Successfully uploaded {{- file}} to {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}
informations.successfulPublish: Successfully uploaded {{- nbNotes}} to {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}
informations.waitingWorkflow: Now, waiting for the workflow to be completed...

export.desc: Export settings to clipboard or a file.
export.title: Export settings

import.desc: Import settings from text or a file. Note : this will overwrite your current settings (except for username, repo name and token).
import.title: Import settings

listChangedFiles.title: List of files edited in the repository

branch.alreadyExists: Branch already exists ({{- branchName}} on {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}} - Using it.
branch.success: Branch successfully created (status: {{- branchStatus}}) on {{- repo.owner}}/{{- repo.repo}}

conversion.desc: Theses option won't change the content of the file in your Obsidian Vault, but will change the content of the file in GitHub.

hardBreak.desc: Add a markdown hard line break (double whitespace) after each line.
hardBreak.title: Markdown hard line break

links.desc: Put `links: false` in the frontmatter of a note to prevent links to it to be converted and keep the alt text (or filename)

folderNote.desc: Rename files to a specified name (default: index.md) if it has the same name as their parent folder/category (also works if the note is outside of the folder).
folderNote.title: Folder note

internals.desc: Convert internal links to their counterpart in the repository, with relative path.
internals.shareAll: Includes all links for the "share all" settings, as it impossible without frontmatter to know the sharing state of a file.
internals.title: Internals links

nonShared.desc: Same option as internals, but for notes that are not yet published. Disabled, only the filename will be conserved.
nonShared.title: Convert internal links pointing to unpublished notes

slugify.desc: Standardize the slug of anchor links (pointing to heading title). Transform the slug into all lower case. Replace space with hyphen. Applicable only for anchor links in markdown link syntax.
slugify.title: Sluglify anchor in markdown links

links.title: Links

wikilinks.desc: Convert Wikilinks to MDlinks, without changing the contents.
wikilinks.title: [[Wikilinks]] to [MDlinks](links)

tags.desc: This will convert any properties or dataview inline field into properties tags. Separate fields with a comma.

exclude.desc: This will exclude value from being converted. Separate fields with a comma.
exclude.title: Exclude value from conversion

inlineTags.desc: Add your inline tags in your properties tags field and converting nested tags with replacing "/" with "_"
inlineTags.title: Inline tags

tags.title: Convert properties/dataview fields into tags

conversion.title: Text & link converters

bake.text: Allow you to add text before and after each embed, for example adding HTML or stylize the block with markdown.
bake.title: Include embed settings

variable.desc: It is possible to use the following variable:
variable.title: : note embedded title

bake.warning: If you use HTML, depending of your host settings, the markdown will broke.

char.desc: Character(s) to add before the link.
char.title: Embed characters

defaultImageFolder.desc: To use a folder different from default
defaultImageFolder.title: Default attachment folder

forcePush.desc: The following extensions will always be published, regardless of the last sending date.
forcePush.info: By default, attachments are only sent if they have been modified since they were last sent, or if they do not exist in the repository.
forcePush.separateByComma:
Separate extensions with commas. 
You can use regex by enclosing it with "/", like /regex/. Use {{all}} to force all attachments to be sent.
forcePush.title: Force attachments to be sent

imagePath.desc: Use the obsidian folder structure or configure a default folder below
imagePath.title: Structure

links.desc: Allow to edit the links of the embeds, removing entirely the citation, or transform to a simple link
links.title: Change embed markup

transferMetaFile.desc: Set the names of the metadata field you want to use to send files. Separate fields with a comma. Dataview inline field are supported.
transferMetaFile.title: Send files using a metadata field

transferNotes.desc: Send embedded notes in a shared file to GitHub. Only shared files will be send!
transferNotes.title: Transfer embedded notes

apiType.desc: Choose between the GitHub API or the GitHub Enterprise API (only GitHub Enterprise users — Advanced user!).

hostname.desc: The hostname of your GitHub Enterprise instance.
hostname.title: GitHub Enterprise Hostname

apiType.title: API Type

branch.desc: If you use a different branch than "main"
branch.title: Main branch

button.default: By default, it will be in:
button.description: You can edit the file path where the token will be stored.
button.tooltip: Modify the path of the file containing the token
button.variables: You can use the following variables:

ghToken.desc: A GitHub token with repository permission. You can generate it

repoName.desc: The name of the repository where you store your blog.
repoName.title: Repository name

modals.default: The name "default" is reserved for your primary configuration.
modals.desc: These "other repositories" allow you to use all the commands on the repositories added below.
modals.frontmatterInfo: Using the "shortRepo" properties key with the "smartKey" also allows you to use this repository in a file without having to write its path.

shortcuts.desc: Add all commands for this repository in the command palette
shortcuts.title: Shortcuts

modals.title: Manage others repositories

username.desc: The username or organization hosting the repo in GitHub
username.title: GitHub username

autoCleanUp.desc: Remove depublished files (stopped sharing or deleted) from GitHub
autoCleanUp.title: Auto clean up

excludedFiles.desc: If you want to exclude some folder or file from the autoclean, add them here. You can use regex by surrounding the string with "/". Separate files with a comma.
excludedFiles.title: Excluded files and folder

githubAction.desc: If you want to activate a GitHub action when the plugin push the file, set the name of the file (in your .github/worfklows folder). Only workflow with the "workflow_dispatch" event will be triggered.
githubAction.title: GitHub action name

prRequest.desc: The message send when the pull-request is merged. Will always followed by the pull-request number.
prRequest.error: You can't use an empty string here!
prRequest.title: Commit message

useMetadataExtractor.desc: Send the files generated by the metadata-extractor plugin in this folder.
useMetadataExtractor.title: Metadata-extractor files

attachment.folder: Change the default folder for the attachments

baselink.desc: Change the base link for the copy link command. Also disable the link replacer part. Can be used as an properties object with the name
baselink.remove: Remove part of the link. It must be a list!

convert.enableOrDisable: Enable or disable the conversion of links. Disabling this will remove the
convert.syntax: syntax, while keeping the file name or the alternative text.

frontmatter.desc: Moreover, there are some properties keys that can be useful for your workflow. The code below show the default settings, but feel free to change it to your needs in each notes!

embed.char: Add a character(s) before the embedded links. Used only if you set "remove" to "links".

remove.bake: Include the content of the embed (support blocks, heading and entire file)
remove.desc: Modify the aspect of the embedded files link. Can take the followed value:
remove.links: Convert to links (delete or edit the "!")
remove.remove: Delete the citation completely and leave an empty line

frontmatter.hardBreak: Convert all linebreaks to markdown «hard break».
frontmatter.internals: Convert internals links to their counterpart in the website, with relative path. Disabled, the plugin will keep the internal link as is.
frontmatter.nonShared: Convert internal links pointing to a unshared file to their counterpart in the website, with relative path. Disabled, the plugin will keep the filename.
frontmatter.path: You can override all path settings using this key. The path will be relative to the root of your repository.

repo.desc: Change the default repo for the note.

share.other: You could also use another shareKey based on the key set in « Manage other repo ». It allows you to separate your different repository. If the main and secondaries key are used, the main repo will be used.
share.title: This key is used to share a note with the plugin.

frontmatter.shortRepo: Allow to use one of the repo set in other repo settings.
frontmatter.title: Property key cheatsheet
frontmatter.titleKey: Change the title of the note.

multiRepoHelp.desc: If you want to send your notes to multiple repository, you can use the
multiRepoHelp.desc2: key in your properties. The value of this key must be a list of repository. Each repository must have the following keys
multiRepoHelp.exampleDesc: The code below show an example based on your settings.
multiRepoHelp.title: Send to multiple repository

baselink.desc: The base link of your website. By default : https://username.github.io/repo/
baselink.title: Base link

command.desc: Add a command to copy the link of the note (need reloading the plugin to take effect)

copyLink.desc: Send a link to your note in your clipboard

linkPathRemover.desc: Delete this part of the links created. Separate with a comma if several values are to be deleted.
linkPathRemover.title: Deleting part of the link

copyLink.title: Copy link

dev.desc: Advanced user only. Will display as notice according to the previous setting.
dev.title: Display developper logs

editorMenu.desc: Add a sharing command in the right-click menu
editorMenu.title: Editor menu

embedEditRepo.desc: Display a modal how the new version differs
embedEditRepo.title: Show what files are edited, added, or deleted after uploaded

excludedFolder.desc: Never publish file in these folders, regardless of the share key. Read the docs for more info.
excludedFolder.title: Excluded folders

fileMenu.desc: Add a sharing command in the file menu
fileMenu.title: File menu

logNoticeHeader.desc: On mobile, it can be hard to debug the plugin. Enable this option to log every error in a Notice.
logNoticeHeader.title: Notice every error

saveTab.desc: Allows you to reopen the settings on the previously used tab
saveTab.title: Save tab

all.desc: Share all files regardless of the state of the share key of the notes
all.title: Share all files

shareKey.desc: The YAML frontmatter key to publish your file on the website. Default is `share`.

excludedFileName.title: Exclude files with names starting with ...

shareKey.otherRepo: You can also define a share key to separate with others, without using the shortRepo key.
shareKey.title: Share key

regexReplacing.empty: Replacement can be empty to remove the whole string.
regexReplacing.emptyRegex: The value to replace cannot be empty
regexReplacing.forbiddenValue: The {{- what}} cannont contain the character: {{- forbiddenChar}}

inCodeBlocks.runOut: Not runned in the code blocks

modal.desc: Replace text in the file with the given value. Enclose the text with "//" to use regex.

regexReplacing.momentReplaceRegex: Run replacement {{- moment}} the other plugin conversion (dataview, internals links...)
regexReplacing.warningPath: Warning! Using the character "/" will edit the path, be careful with this option.

defaultFolder.desc: Set the default reception folder. Leave it empty to use the root of the repository.
defaultFolder.other: Use this folder as root within the repository (each path will be prepend by it)
defaultFolder.title: Default folder

folderBehavior.desc: Choose the file tree in the repository, with using a property key, a fixed folder or your Obsidian file tree.
folderBehavior.title: File tree in repository

addTitle.title: Automatically add the "title" key with the file name

frontmatterKey.desc: Set the key where to get the folder's value.
frontmatterKey.title: Property key

regexFilePathTitle.desc: If the text is between "//", it will be used as a regex. Otherwise, it will be used as a string.

title.FolderPathTitle: Apply edit on the folder path or the filename (automatically)

rootFolder.desc: Append this path to the folder set by the properties key
rootFolder.other: Use this folder as root within the repository (each path will be prepend by it).
rootFolder.title: Root folder

useFrontmatterTitle.desc: Use a property value to generate the filename. By default, "title" is used.
useFrontmatterTitle.title: Set the key where to get the value of the filename
